sentences.en: It's that time, I'm so excited. This is Cast Connections and Property Control.
sentences.zh: 终于到这个时候啦，我太激动了。这里是员工专属道具处置店。
sentences.phonetic_us: /ɪts ðæt taɪm, aɪm soʊ ɪkˈsaɪtɪd. ðɪs ɪz kæst kəˈnɛkʃənz ænd ˈprɑpərti kənˈtroʊl/

sentences.en: You cannot come inside unless you have a blue ID or are friends with someone that has a Walt Disney World Employee Identification.
sentences.zh: 除非你有一张蓝色证件，或者你朋友有迪士尼世界的员工证，否则不得入内。
sentences.phonetic_us: /ju ˈkænɑt kʌm ɪnˈsaɪd ənˈlɛs ju hæv ə blu aɪ di ɔr ɑr frɛndz wɪð ˈsʌmwʌn ðæt hæz ə wɔlt ˈdɪzni wɜrld ɛmˌplɔɪˈi aɪˌdɛntɪfɪˈkeɪʃən/

sentences.en: This store is the largest store here in Orlando, Florida for the discounts.
sentences.zh: 这是佛罗里达奥兰多最大的折扣店。
sentences.phonetic_us: /ðɪs stɔr ɪz ðə ˈlɑrdʒəst stɔr hɪr ɪn ɔrˈlændoʊ, ˈflɔrɪdə fɔr ðə ˈdɪsˌkaʊnts/

sentences.en: For now, I'm so excited to see all the Disney merchandise that they have new in stock today.
sentences.zh: 现在，我特别兴奋，想看看他们今天上新的所有迪士尼周边。
sentences.phonetic_us: /fɔr naʊ, aɪm soʊ ɪkˈsaɪtɪd tə si ɔl ðə ˈdɪzni ˈmɜrtʃənˌdaɪz ðæt ðeɪ hæv nu ɪn stɑk təˈdeɪ/

sentences.en: And a lot of this merchandise is up to 90% off.
sentences.zh: 其中很多商品折扣高达90%。
sentences.phonetic_us: /ænd ə lɑt əv ðɪs ˈmɜrtʃənˌdaɪz ɪz ʌp tə ˈnaɪnti pərˈsɛnt ɔf/

sentences.en: If you're wondering what the hours are, there you go.
sentences.zh: 如果你想知道营业时间，就在这儿。
sentences.phonetic_us: /ɪf jʊr ˈwʌndərɪŋ wʌt ðə ˈaʊərz ɑr, ðɛr ju ɡoʊ/
